CustomField.formula: IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Send Small Fleet Link'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Small Fleet Link Sent'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Create Webstore Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Webstore Opportunity Creation In Progress'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Webstore Opportunity Created') ), 'https://www.samsara.com/small-fleets?id='+ AccountId, '')
CustomField.label: Small Fleets Checkout Link
